notesStmt.note: Each part has special t.p. and separate pagination, and is assigned a separate Wing number. Part I has title: Ecclesiastical history epitomiz'd. Part the first. London : Printed for W. Thackery ... T. Passinger, and Charles Passinger ..., 1682 (Wing S3504). Part II has title: An epitomy of ecclesiastical history. Part II. London : Printed for William Thackerey ... and Thomas Passinger ..., 1683 (Wing S3506).
Each part has engraved portrait frontispiece; collective t.p. also engraved.
